attributes.action: Abolish prescription charges is England, Scotland and Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that prescription charges have been abolished in Wales we now have a two tier NHS.

It is now the time to redress this balance and scrap the charges or ensure that ALL NHS services in Wales are funded purely by the Welsh.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
